dimensions:
Warp x Weft: 308 x 21.6 cm (10 ft. 1 1/4 in. x 8 1/2 in.)
Weft (stretched out): 20 in.
title: Futsu Crisscross
medium:
Medium: 62% silk (raw silk and kibiso) and 38% cotton
Technique: plain weave double cloth
description: Double cloth of thick and thin stripes in black and white. Vertical bands of thick black and white stripes alternate with horizontal bands of thin black and white stripes. Overtwisted black threads create a puckered effect.
name: Textile
